aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.text: At Ur Needs, we believe beauty is confidence. We created this app to make your daily self-care routine simpler, more enjoyable, and more accessible. In our catalog, you'll find only trusted brands, natural ingredients, and products you can rely on. Take care of yourself — we’ll take care of the rest.
